MORE JOY IN THE JOURNEY

Focusing on what is important brings joy.

It allows us to live fully in the moment.

For me, being present creates joyful memories.

These memories would not exist otherwise.

I smile more often now.

I value simplicity in my life.

I feel more joy each day.

The Dalai Lama, a true Essentialist, said this.

“If one's life is simple, contentment has to come.”

Simplicity is extremely important for happiness.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Focusing on what is truly important allows for a more joyful and content life in the present moment.
